application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to ref: 21/01149/FUL: Construction Management Plan (3), external materials (4), potable water (5), Energy Statement (6), Final Energy Performance Certificate (7), SuDs (8), refuse storage facilities (9), biodiversity enhancements (10), cycle storage (11), for the creation of additional storey comprising 2x self-contained flats involving front dormers and front, rear and side rooflights together with 2-storey side extension incorporating access door, bin and cycle store, raised steps and associated parking.
site_name: Park Lodge 79A Norfolk AvenueSouthgateN13 6AP
